Job Description: Job Description   We are looking for an enthusiastic Software Engineering graduate to be a part of our Software Development team who design, develop, and install innovative software solutions that comply with coding standards and technical architecture.   You should have    A degree in Computer Science     0 to 1 years of experience     Ability to develop software in Java, C, JavaScript, and other programming languages     Hands on knowledge in Linux, HTML, CSS, JQuery     Understanding of object-oriented programming, DBMS, SQL, MySQL     A commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and quality product    Your job responsibilities    Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code     Code and test new Windows and web software applications     Discover, investigate and develop skills in new technologies    You should also    Execute full software development life cycle (SDLC)     Coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure     Have the ability to document requirements and specifications
